metadata.title: CVE-2016-10081 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: /usr/bin/shutter in Shutter through 0.93.1 allows user-assisted remoteattackers to execute arbitrary commands via a crafted image name that ismishandled during a "Run a plugin" action.

criterions.comment: shutter: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
